Articles.Content: HO-LY CRAP. That finale was perfect! Any other BrBa fans on here?
right here. i thought it was ok but i expected moar violence.
Yeah same. Tied up most of the loose ends, but not exactly the ending I was anticipating, close though. Would have liked to know what happened after the dust settled too.

I'm not crying, there's something in my eye.

(how i felt when the episode ended)
